Title: Episode #3.6
Writer: Jed Mercurio (creator), Jed Mercurio (written and created by)
Actors: Patrick Buchanan, Martin Compston, Ash Cook, George Costigan
Plot: DS Steve Arnott is arrested on suspicion of murder but continues to protest his innocence. DC Kate Fleming's undercover operation unveils unexpected facts, but will it hold the key to Steve's innocence and the identity of the Caddy?
